name: SendTransactionalSms
description:
Send a transactional SMS message using a template.

Send a transactional SMS by providing a `transactional_message_id`, which can be the numerical ID or *Trigger Name* of your message template. This allows you to automate SMS communications using predefined templates.

parameters.name: transactional_message_details
parameters.description: Provide the JSON payload containing details necessary for sending the SMS, such as `transactional_message_id`, recipient information, and any dynamic content required by the template.
